loadnotes: Stations 1 and 5 may carry 750 gal (2800L, weight 6,000, load 10.0/6.5, 240 fuel points) or 3000 gal (11,000L, weight 20,000, load 20.0/12.5, 975 fuel points) FTs.
Stations 2 and 3 may each carry (a) twelve BB, (b) two ADM-120 Quail decoys, (c) one AGM-28 Hound Dog ASM, or (d) six AGM-69 SRAM ASM.

Station 3 is the internal bomb bay. It may carry (a) eight nuclear BB and two ADM-120 Quail decoys,(b) sixteen AGM-69 SRAM ASM, (c) eight AGM-69 SRAM ASM and two ADM-120 Quail decoys, (d) sixty six 750 lb BB, or (e) eighty four 500 lb BB.
